duties_responsibilities.duty: Individualized teaching in Biology, Physics, Chemistry, and Math to elementary, middle, or high school aged students.
Flexible schedule coordination with Campus Director to set class slots.
Utilize prepared lesson plans with minimal grading and prepping required for individualized teaching.
Engage with students to identify and develop better learning strategies.
Collaborate with campus to accommodate student and campus needs.
Adhere to state COVID-19 guidelines for campus operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in subject area of expertise.
Advanced degree in specific subject area of expertise (preferred)
